```{r main_libs, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(rmdformats)

## Global options
options(max.print="75")
opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE,
               prompt=FALSE,
               tidy=TRUE,
               comment=NA,
               message=FALSE,
               warning=FALSE,
	             cache=TRUE,
               #cache_rebuild=TRUE,
               cache.path='tme_report_cache/html/',
               fig.path='tme_report_files/figure-html/'
               )
opts_knit$set(width=125)

htmltools::img(src = knitr::image_uri(file.path("../images", "pact2.png")), 
               alt = 'logo', 
               style = 'position:absolute; top:0; right:0; padding:10px;')
```
